de.must.print
Interface ProportionalListReport

All Superinterfaces:
Controllable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProportionalListReportByHtml, ProportionalListReportDirectly, ProportionalListReportDirectly, TableToHTML
public interface ProportionalListReport
extends Controllable

Interface for lists with proportional column definition. Implementing classes put information freely at any position according to the used grid. For the standard, defaultProportion is set. To put info at a different position, println with a divergent proportion is called. General difference - which is wished - to the java print model is: Instead of "don't call us, we'll call you", the *real* listing is supported: Let's read database records once and forget page 1 immediately. ;-)
